trans-unit.source: Set Blob Properties
trans-unit.target: Set Blob Properties

trans-unit.source: Set Blob Properties
trans-unit.target: Set Blob Properties

trans-unit.source: The <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Set Blob Properties</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation sets system properties on the blob.
trans-unit.target: The <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Set Blob Properties</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation sets system properties on the blob.

trans-unit.source: Request
trans-unit.target: Request

trans-unit.source: The <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Set Blob Properties</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> request may be constructed as follows.
trans-unit.target: The <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Set Blob Properties</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> request may be constructed as follows.

trans-unit.source: HTTPS is recommended.
trans-unit.target: HTTPS is recommended.

trans-unit.source: Replace <placeholder>myaccount</placeholder> with the name of your storage account:
trans-unit.target: Replace <placeholder>myaccount</placeholder> with the name of your storage account:

trans-unit.source: PUT Method Request URI
trans-unit.target: PUT Method Request URI

trans-unit.source: HTTP Version
trans-unit.target: HTTP Version

trans-unit.source: HTTP/1.1
trans-unit.target: HTTP/1.1

trans-unit.source: Emulated Storage Service URI
trans-unit.target: Emulated Storage Service URI

trans-unit.source: When making a request against the emulated storage service, specify the emulator hostname and Blob service port as <codeInline>127.0.0.1:10000</codeInline>, followed by the emulated storage account name:
trans-unit.target: When making a request against the emulated storage service, specify the emulator hostname and Blob service port as <codeInline>127.0.0.1:10000</codeInline>, followed by the emulated storage account name:

trans-unit.target: PUT Method Request URI

trans-unit.target: The following table describes required and optional request headers for all blob types.

trans-unit.source: Request Header
trans-unit.target: Request Header

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the authentication scheme, account name, and signature.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the authentication scheme, account name, and signature.

trans-unit.target: <parameterReference>Date</parameterReference> or <parameterReference>x-ms-date</parameterReference>

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) for the request.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) for the request.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="96cec7bc-63cc-4227-920a-dddd850433c9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authentication Schemes</link>.

trans-unit.source: Required for all authenticated requests.
trans-unit.target: Required for all authenticated requests.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: Modifies the cache control string for the blob.
trans-unit.target: Modifies the cache control string for the blob.

trans-unit.source: If this property is not specified on the request, then the property will be cleared for the blob.
trans-unit.target: If this property is not specified on the request, then the property will be cleared for the blob.

trans-unit.source: Subsequent calls to <link xlink:href="56a87f11-8f6b-44c8-b46f-7531d359875e" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Blob Properties</link> will not return this property, unless it is explicitly set on the blob again.
trans-unit.target: Subsequent calls to <link xlink:href="56a87f11-8f6b-44c8-b46f-7531d359875e" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Blob Properties</link> will not return this property, unless it is explicitly set on the blob again.

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: Sets the blob’s content type.
trans-unit.target: Sets the blob’s content type.

trans-unit.source: If this property is not specified on the request, then the property will be cleared for the blob.
trans-unit.target: If this property is not specified on the request, then the property will be cleared for the blob.

trans-unit.source: Subsequent calls to <link xlink:href="56a87f11-8f6b-44c8-b46f-7531d359875e" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Blob Properties</link> will not return this property, unless it is explicitly set on the blob again.
trans-unit.target: Subsequent calls to <link xlink:href="56a87f11-8f6b-44c8-b46f-7531d359875e" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Blob Properties</link> will not return this property, unless it is explicitly set on the blob again.

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: Sets the blob's MD5 hash.
trans-unit.target: Sets the blob's MD5 hash.

trans-unit.source: If this property is not specified on the request, then the property will be cleared for the blob.
trans-unit.target: If this property is not specified on the request, then the property will be cleared for the blob.

trans-unit.source: Subsequent calls to <link xlink:href="56a87f11-8f6b-44c8-b46f-7531d359875e" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Blob Properties</link> will not return this property, unless it is explicitly set on the blob again.
trans-unit.target: Subsequent calls to <link xlink:href="56a87f11-8f6b-44c8-b46f-7531d359875e" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Blob Properties</link> will not return this property, unless it is explicitly set on the blob again.

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: Sets the blob's content encoding.
trans-unit.target: Sets the blob's content encoding.

trans-unit.source: If this property is not specified on the request, then the property will be cleared for the blob.
trans-unit.target: If this property is not specified on the request, then the property will be cleared for the blob.

trans-unit.target: Subsequent calls to <link xlink:href="56a87f11-8f6b-44c8-b46f-7531d359875e" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Blob Properties</link> will not return this property, unless it is explicitly set on the blob again.

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: Sets the blob's content language.
trans-unit.target: Sets the blob's content language.

trans-unit.source: If this property is not specified on the request, then the property will be cleared for the blob.
trans-unit.target: If this property is not specified on the request, then the property will be cleared for the blob.

trans-unit.source: Subsequent calls to <link xlink:href="56a87f11-8f6b-44c8-b46f-7531d359875e" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Blob Properties</link> will not return this property, unless it is explicitly set on the blob again.
trans-unit.target: Subsequent calls to <link xlink:href="56a87f11-8f6b-44c8-b46f-7531d359875e" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Blob Properties</link> will not return this property, unless it is explicitly set on the blob again.

trans-unit.source: Required if the blob has an active lease.
trans-unit.target: Required if the blob has an active lease.

trans-unit.source: To perform this operation on a blob with an active lease, specify the valid lease ID for this header.
trans-unit.target: To perform this operation on a blob with an active lease, specify the valid lease ID for this header.

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: Provides a client-generated, opaque value with a 1 KB character limit that is recorded in the analytics logs when storage analytics logging is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Provides a client-generated, opaque value with a 1 KB character limit that is recorded in the analytics logs when storage analytics logging is enabled.

trans-unit.source: Using this header is highly recommended for correlating client-side activities with requests received by the server.
trans-unit.target: Using this header is highly recommended for correlating client-side activities with requests received by the server.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="1727932c-8a3b-4502-86ac-c89931d54bac" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">About Storage Analytics Logging</link> and <externalLink><linkText>Azure Logging: Using Logs to Track Storage Requests</linkText><linkUri>http://blogs.msdn.com/b/windowsazurestorage/archive/2011/08/03/windows-azure-storage-logging-using-logs-to-track-storage-requests.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="1727932c-8a3b-4502-86ac-c89931d54bac" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">About Storage Analytics Logging</link> and <externalLink><linkText>Azure Logging: Using Logs to Track Storage Requests</linkText><linkUri>http://blogs.msdn.com/b/windowsazurestorage/archive/2011/08/03/windows-azure-storage-logging-using-logs-to-track-storage-requests.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: Sets the blob’s <parameterReference>Content-Disposition</parameterReference> header.
trans-unit.target: Sets the blob’s <parameterReference>Content-Disposition</parameterReference> header.

trans-unit.source: Available for versions 2013-08-15 and later.
trans-unit.target: Available for versions 2013-08-15 and later.

trans-unit.source: The <parameterReference>Content-Disposition</parameterReference> response header field conveys additional information about how to process the response payload, and also can be used to attach additional metadata.
trans-unit.target: The <parameterReference>Content-Disposition</parameterReference> response header field conveys additional information about how to process the response payload, and also can be used to attach additional metadata.

trans-unit.source: For example, if set to <codeInline>attachment</codeInline>, it indicates that the user-agent should not display the response, but instead show a <ui>Save As</ui> dialog with a filename other than the blob name specified.
trans-unit.target: For example, if set to <codeInline>attachment</codeInline>, it indicates that the user-agent should not display the response, but instead show a <ui>Save As</ui> dialog with a filename other than the blob name specified.

trans-unit.source: The response from the <link xlink:href="a3e943b4-5745-4e64-9d6f-728bbefbd5ee" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Blob (REST API)</link> and <link xlink:href="56a87f11-8f6b-44c8-b46f-7531d359875e" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Blob Properties (REST API)</link> operations includes the <parameterReference>content-disposition</parameterReference> header.
trans-unit.target: The response from the <link xlink:href="a3e943b4-5745-4e64-9d6f-728bbefbd5ee" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Blob (REST API)</link> and <link xlink:href="56a87f11-8f6b-44c8-b46f-7531d359875e" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Blob Properties (REST API)</link> operations includes the <parameterReference>content-disposition</parameterReference> header.

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the origin from which the request is issued.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the origin from which the request is issued.

trans-unit.source: The presence of this header results in cross-origin resource sharing headers on the response.
trans-unit.target: The presence of this header results in cross-origin resource sharing headers on the response.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="a7d724fb-63f9-41e2-944e-23af461ec123" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) Support for the Azure Storage Services</link> for details.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="a7d724fb-63f9-41e2-944e-23af461ec123" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) Support for the Azure Storage Services</link> for details.

trans-unit.source: This operation also supports the use of conditional headers to set blob properties only if a specified condition is met.
trans-unit.target: This operation also supports the use of conditional headers to set blob properties only if a specified condition is met.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="36087161-9e7c-47e4-904c-3392cc35a8e9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Specifying Conditional Headers for Blob Service Operations</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="36087161-9e7c-47e4-904c-3392cc35a8e9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Specifying Conditional Headers for Blob Service Operations</link>.

trans-unit.source: Request Headers (Page Blobs Only)
trans-unit.target: Request Headers (Page Blobs Only)

trans-unit.source: The following table describes request headers applicable only for operations on page blobs.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes request headers applicable only for operations on page blobs.

trans-unit.source: Request header
trans-unit.target: Request header

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: Resizes a page blob to the specified size.
trans-unit.target: Resizes a page blob to the specified size.

trans-unit.source: If the specified value is less than the current size of the blob, then all pages above the specified value are cleared.
trans-unit.target: If the specified value is less than the current size of the blob, then all pages above the specified value are cleared.

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be used to change the size of a block blob or an append blob.
trans-unit.target: This property cannot be used to change the size of a block blob or an append blob.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property for a block blob or an append blob returns status code 400 (Bad Request).
trans-unit.target: Setting this property for a block blob or an append blob returns status code 400 (Bad Request).

trans-unit.source: Optional, but required if the <parameterReference>x-ms-blob-sequence-number</parameterReference> header is set for the request.
trans-unit.target: Optional, but required if the <parameterReference>x-ms-blob-sequence-number</parameterReference> header is set for the request.

trans-unit.source: This property applies to page blobs only.
trans-unit.target: This property applies to page blobs only.

trans-unit.source: This property indicates how the service should modify the blob's sequence number.
trans-unit.target: This property indicates how the service should modify the blob's sequence number.

trans-unit.source: Specify one of the following options for this property:
trans-unit.target: Specify one of the following options for this property:

trans-unit.source: <parameterReference>max</parameterReference>: Sets the sequence number to be the higher of the value included with the request and the value currently stored for the blob.
trans-unit.target: <parameterReference>max</parameterReference>: Sets the sequence number to be the higher of the value included with the request and the value currently stored for the blob.

trans-unit.source: <parameterReference>update</parameterReference>: Sets the sequence number to the value included with the request.
trans-unit.target: <parameterReference>update</parameterReference>: Sets the sequence number to the value included with the request.

trans-unit.source: <parameterReference>increment</parameterReference>: Increments the value of the sequence number by 1.
trans-unit.target: <parameterReference>increment</parameterReference>: Increments the value of the sequence number by 1.

trans-unit.source: If specifying this option, do not include the <parameterReference>x-ms-blob-sequence-number header</parameterReference>; doing so will return status code 400 (Bad Request).
trans-unit.target: If specifying this option, do not include the <parameterReference>x-ms-blob-sequence-number header</parameterReference>; doing so will return status code 400 (Bad Request).

trans-unit.source: Optional, but required if the <parameterReference>x-ms-sequence-number-action</parameterReference> property is set to <parameterReference>max</parameterReference> or <parameterReference>update</parameterReference>.
trans-unit.target: Optional, but required if the <parameterReference>x-ms-sequence-number-action</parameterReference> property is set to <parameterReference>max</parameterReference> or <parameterReference>update</parameterReference>.

trans-unit.source: This property applies to page blobs only.
trans-unit.target: This property applies to page blobs only.

trans-unit.source: This property sets the blob's sequence number.
trans-unit.target: This property sets the blob's sequence number.

trans-unit.source: The sequence number is a user-controlled property that you can use to track requests and manage concurrency issues.
trans-unit.target: The sequence number is a user-controlled property that you can use to track requests and manage concurrency issues.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <link xlink:href="ba36957a-ffd0-4080-8325-0fbb85d56330" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Put Page</link> operation.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see the <link xlink:href="ba36957a-ffd0-4080-8325-0fbb85d56330" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Put Page</link> operation.

trans-unit.source: Use this property together with the <parameterReference>x-ms-sequence-number-action</parameterReference> to update the blob's sequence number, either to the specified value or to the higher of the values specified with the request or currently stored with the blob.
trans-unit.target: Use this property together with the <parameterReference>x-ms-sequence-number-action</parameterReference> to update the blob's sequence number, either to the specified value or to the higher of the values specified with the request or currently stored with the blob.

trans-unit.source: This header should not be specified if <parameterReference>x-ms-sequence-number-action</parameterReference> is set to <parameterReference>increment</parameterReference>; in this case the service automatically increments the sequence number by one.
trans-unit.target: This header should not be specified if <parameterReference>x-ms-sequence-number-action</parameterReference> is set to <parameterReference>increment</parameterReference>; in this case the service automatically increments the sequence number by one.

trans-unit.source: To set the sequence number to a value of your choosing, this property must be specified on the request together with <parameterReference>x-ms-sequence-number-action</parameterReference>.
trans-unit.target: To set the sequence number to a value of your choosing, this property must be specified on the request together with <parameterReference>x-ms-sequence-number-action</parameterReference>.

trans-unit.source: Request Body
trans-unit.target: Request Body

trans-unit.source: None.
trans-unit.target: None.

trans-unit.source: Response
trans-unit.target: Response

trans-unit.source: The response includes an HTTP status code and a set of response headers.
trans-unit.target: The response includes an HTTP status code and a set of response headers.

trans-unit.source: Status Code
trans-unit.target: Status Code

trans-unit.source: A successful operation returns status code 200 (OK).
trans-unit.target: A successful operation returns status code 200 (OK).

trans-unit.source: For information about status codes, see <link xlink:href="4421ac96-38eb-4ea3-8104-f9975c3bf153" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.
trans-unit.target: For information about status codes, see <link xlink:href="4421ac96-38eb-4ea3-8104-f9975c3bf153" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.

trans-unit.source: Response Headers
trans-unit.target: Response Headers

trans-unit.source: The response for this operation includes the following headers.
trans-unit.target: The response for this operation includes the following headers.

trans-unit.source: The response may also include additional standard HTTP headers.
trans-unit.target: The response may also include additional standard HTTP headers.

trans-unit.source: All standard headers conform to the <externalLink><linkText>HTTP/1.1 protocol specification</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=150478</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: All standard headers conform to the <externalLink><linkText>HTTP/1.1 protocol specification</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=150478</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Syntax
trans-unit.target: Syntax

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: The ETag contains a value that you can use to perform operations conditionally.
trans-unit.target: The ETag contains a value that you can use to perform operations conditionally.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="36087161-9e7c-47e4-904c-3392cc35a8e9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Specifying Conditional Headers for Blob Service Operations</link> for more information.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="36087161-9e7c-47e4-904c-3392cc35a8e9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Specifying Conditional Headers for Blob Service Operations</link> for more information.

trans-unit.source: If the request version is 2011-08-18 or newer, the ETag value will be in quotes.
trans-unit.target: If the request version is 2011-08-18 or newer, the ETag value will be in quotes.

trans-unit.source: The date/time that the blob was last modified.
trans-unit.target: The date/time that the blob was last modified.

trans-unit.source: The date format follows RFC 1123.
trans-unit.target: The date format follows RFC 1123.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="d4f67d84-a51c-4ff7-8bd0-0ae206c9e3c9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Representation of Date/Time Values in Headers</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="d4f67d84-a51c-4ff7-8bd0-0ae206c9e3c9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Representation of Date/Time Values in Headers</link>.

trans-unit.source: Any write operation on the blob (including updates on the blob's metadata or properties) changes the last modified time of the blob.
trans-unit.target: Any write operation on the blob (including updates on the blob's metadata or properties) changes the last modified time of the blob.

trans-unit.source: If the blob is a page blob, the blob's current sequence number is returned with this header.
trans-unit.target: If the blob is a page blob, the blob's current sequence number is returned with this header.

trans-unit.source: This header uniquely identifies the request that was made and can be used for troubleshooting the request.
trans-unit.target: This header uniquely identifies the request that was made and can be used for troubleshooting the request.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="b20a45d8-7453-487c-b492-69dc5a5b6d2d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Troubleshooting API Operations</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="b20a45d8-7453-487c-b492-69dc5a5b6d2d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Troubleshooting API Operations</link>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the version of the Blob service used to execute the request.
trans-unit.target: Indicates the version of the Blob service used to execute the request.

trans-unit.source: This header is returned for requests made against version 2009-09-19 and later.
trans-unit.target: This header is returned for requests made against version 2009-09-19 and later.

trans-unit.source: A UTC date/time value generated by the service that indicates the time at which the response was initiated.
trans-unit.target: A UTC date/time value generated by the service that indicates the time at which the response was initiated.

trans-unit.source: Returned if the request includes an <parameterReference>Origin</parameterReference> header and CORS is enabled with a matching rule.
trans-unit.target: Returned if the request includes an <parameterReference>Origin</parameterReference> header and CORS is enabled with a matching rule.

trans-unit.source: This header returns the value of the origin request header in case of a match.
trans-unit.target: This header returns the value of the origin request header in case of a match.

trans-unit.source: Returned if the request includes an <parameterReference>Origin</parameterReference> header and CORS is enabled with a matching rule.
trans-unit.target: Returned if the request includes an <parameterReference>Origin</parameterReference> header and CORS is enabled with a matching rule.

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of response headers that are to be exposed to the client or issuer of the request.
trans-unit.target: Returns the list of response headers that are to be exposed to the client or issuer of the request.

trans-unit.source: Returned if the request includes an <parameterReference>Origin</parameterReference> header and CORS is enabled with a matching rule that does not allow all origins.
trans-unit.target: Returned if the request includes an <parameterReference>Origin</parameterReference> header and CORS is enabled with a matching rule that does not allow all origins.

trans-unit.source: This header will be set to true.
trans-unit.target: This header will be set to true.

trans-unit.source: Response Body
trans-unit.target: Response Body

trans-unit.source: None.
trans-unit.target: None.

trans-unit.source: Authorization
trans-unit.target: Authorization

trans-unit.source: This operation can only be called by the account owner and by anyone with a Shared Access Signature that has permission to write to this blob or its container.
trans-unit.target: This operation can only be called by the account owner and by anyone with a Shared Access Signature that has permission to write to this blob or its container.

trans-unit.source: The semantics for updating a blob's properties are as follows:
trans-unit.target: The semantics for updating a blob's properties are as follows:

trans-unit.source: A page blob's sequence number is updated only if the request meets either of the following conditions:
trans-unit.target: A page blob's sequence number is updated only if the request meets either of the following conditions:

trans-unit.source: The request sets the <parameterReference>x-ms-sequence-number-action</parameterReference> to <parameterReference>max</parameterReference> or <parameterReference>update</parameterReference>, and also specifies a value for the <parameterReference>x-ms-blob-sequence-number</parameterReference> header.
trans-unit.target: The request sets the <parameterReference>x-ms-sequence-number-action</parameterReference> to <parameterReference>max</parameterReference> or <parameterReference>update</parameterReference>, and also specifies a value for the <parameterReference>x-ms-blob-sequence-number</parameterReference> header.

trans-unit.source: The request sets the <parameterReference>x-ms-sequence-number-action</parameterReference> to <parameterReference>increment</parameterReference>, indicating that the service should increment the sequence number by one.
trans-unit.target: The request sets the <parameterReference>x-ms-sequence-number-action</parameterReference> to <parameterReference>increment</parameterReference>, indicating that the service should increment the sequence number by one.

trans-unit.source: A page blob's size is modified only if the request specifies a value for the <parameterReference>x-ms-content-length</parameterReference> header.
trans-unit.target: A page blob's size is modified only if the request specifies a value for the <parameterReference>x-ms-content-length</parameterReference> header.

trans-unit.source: If a request sets only <parameterReference>x-ms-blob-sequence-number</parameterReference> and/or <parameterReference>x-ms-content-length</parameterReference>, and no other properties, then none of the blob's other properties are modified.
trans-unit.target: If a request sets only <parameterReference>x-ms-blob-sequence-number</parameterReference> and/or <parameterReference>x-ms-content-length</parameterReference>, and no other properties, then none of the blob's other properties are modified.

trans-unit.source: If any one or more of the following properties is set in the request, then all of these properties are set together.
trans-unit.target: If any one or more of the following properties is set in the request, then all of these properties are set together.

trans-unit.source: If a value is not provided for a given property when at least one of the properties listed below is set, then that property will be cleared for the blob.
trans-unit.target: If a value is not provided for a given property when at least one of the properties listed below is set, then that property will be cleared for the blob.

trans-unit.source: Note that for a shared access signature, you can override certain properties stored for the blob by specifying query parameters as part of the shared access signature.
trans-unit.target: Note that for a shared access signature, you can override certain properties stored for the blob by specifying query parameters as part of the shared access signature.

trans-unit.source: These properties include the <parameterReference>cache-control</parameterReference>, <parameterReference>content-type</parameterReference>, <parameterReference>content-encoding</parameterReference>, <parameterReference>content-language</parameterReference>, and <parameterReference>content-disposition</parameterReference> properties.
trans-unit.target: These properties include the <parameterReference>cache-control</parameterReference>, <parameterReference>content-type</parameterReference>, <parameterReference>content-encoding</parameterReference>, <parameterReference>content-language</parameterReference>, and <parameterReference>content-disposition</parameterReference> properties.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="2686d543-29ff-4b60-a2c0-a505f421ebf9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Constructing the Shared Access Signature URI (REST API)</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="2686d543-29ff-4b60-a2c0-a505f421ebf9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Constructing the Shared Access Signature URI (REST API)</link>.
